      • getUnhappyPeople

        public final double getUnhappyPeople(int year)
        Calculates number of unhappy people in country for a given year based on formula in specifications. For START_YEAR, returns undernourished population to avoid null pointer.
        Parameters:
        year - year in question
        Returns:
        number of unhappy people for that year

      • getSurplus

        public final double getSurplus(int year,
                               EnumFood type)
        Returns difference between country's production and need for a crop for the specified year. If a positive value is returned, country has a surplus available for export. If a negative value is returned, country has unmet need to be satisfied by imports.
        Parameters:
        year - year in question
        type - type of crop
        Returns:
        surplus/shortfall of crop

      • getTotalCropNeed

        public final double getTotalCropNeed(int year,
                                     EnumFood crop)
        Returns how many tons of crop country needs for specified year
        Parameters:
        year - year in question
        crop - crop in question
        Returns:
        total tons needed to meet population's need

      • getNetCropAvailable

        public final double getNetCropAvailable(int year,
                                        EnumFood crop)
        Calculates net crop available using formula from p. 15 of spec 1.7
        Parameters:
        year - year in question
        crop - crop in question
        Returns:
        tons available
